meanings.definition: An inscription, heading, or title placed above or on the top of something.
meanings.sent1: The superscriptions on the book cover caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The superscriptions on the map helped us navigate the city.
meanings.sent3: The superscriptions on the cake made it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a superscription that brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The superscriptions on the sign were clear and easy to read.

meanings.definition: A written or printed direction on a package, letter, or document indicating its destination or contents.
meanings.sent1: The superscriptions on the envelope showed the address.
meanings.sent2: The superscriptions on the box indicated its fragile contents.
meanings.sent3: The superscriptions on the letter were written in a fancy font.
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like superscriptions, guiding her through the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The superscriptions on the document were clear and concise.
